modules.name: Shuffle
modules.description: Randomly re-orders the signals of a polyphonic signal. CV controls for seed and number of output channels.

modules.name: Calendar
modules.description: Outputs a variety of CVs, Triggers, and Gates related to local time and calendar.

modules.name: Seed
modules.description: Given an input "seed" voltage, outputs 16 random voltages, with 16 mono outputs and 1 polyphonic output for convenience.

modules.name: Ouroboros
modules.description: Sequentially step through the channels of a polyphonic input.

modules.name: Append
modules.description: Join up to 16 mono or polyphonic signals together into a single array, and output a CV controlled (length, rotation) subset of them as a polyphonic signal.
